participant_1.name: Raven
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, often feeling misunderstood but passionate about causes they care about.
participant_1.background: the holidays make me depressed. i've rainbow hair. my age is too old to say. i'm an animal activist. i spend my time bird watching with my cats.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Practical and straightforward, with a dry sense of humor and a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue.

content.text: Dude, I don't understand you. Please, use English. (¬‿¬)
